discharge_text: DISCHARGE SUMMARY: 65yo with heart failure, admitted for dyspnea and lower extremity edema. Echo showed EF 35%. Improved with IV diuretics. Discharged on furosemide, lisinopril, metformin. Follow-up in 2 weeks.

DISCHARGE SUMMARY: 58yo with CAD, presented with chest pain. Cardiac cath showed 80% LAD stenosis, underwent PCI with stent. Troponin peaked at 2.5. Discharged on dual antiplatelet therapy. Follow-up in 1 week.

DISCHARGE SUMMARY: 72yo with acute cholecystitis. Underwent laparoscopic cholecystectomy without complications. Pathology confirmed chronic cholecystitis. Discharged on acetaminophen PRN. Follow-up in 2 weeks.
